text: Dear all, anyone can help see if the ci works right now? I use recheck and reverify to trigger ci for <https://gerrit.hyperledger.org/r/#/c/3601/>, but it doesn’t react. Thanks!
I wonder if the retrigger plugin is broken. the ci skip plugin broke as well
<@U0Z41KY5V> they are all failing for the same reason: not connecting.
<@U0Z41KY5V> let me look into this in an hour or so
